title: Some Questions about Replays in Beta Client
body:
1. After I have downloaded it, where can I find it? As in, which folder can I find it AND where else in the client can I replay it if I have played more than 20 matches after the downloaded match. I can only open it from the entry in match history, and after 20 matches the entry will disappear

2. On the next patch, if I have downloaded it previously, can I still access the replay?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm unsure about the second question, I assume so but can't promise anything.

For your first question, the replays should be stored at **C:\My Documents\League of Legends\Replays** (Replace C with whatever drive your users Documents folder is located on)
